Text to speech
Create a tag for your dog! Example: If dog runs away, the finder could touch the tag and call the owner.
This is an editable tag. Only you can edit but anyone who touches the tag will enjoy the experience.
Event will be saved on device.
By deleting SmartTag NT3 from device, the tag will be reset and any events will be deleted.
If someone else connects to this tag and creates an event, you will no longer be event administrator.
